23#ifndef ASSERT_H
24#define ASSERT_H
25
26void assertion_failed(int, const char *);
27
28inline void do_assert(int expr, int line, const char *file)
29{
30 if (!expr)
31 assertion_failed(line, file);
32}
33#endif /* ASSERT_H */
34
35#undef assert
36
37#ifdef NDEBUG
38#define assert(ignore) /* as nothing */
39#else
40#define assert(expr) do_assert(expr, __LINE__, __FILE__)
41#endif
42
